text: jis din kahenge munaafiq purush tatha munaafiq striyaan unase, jo eemaan laaye ki hamaaree prateeksha karo, ham praapt kar len tumhaare prakaash mein se kuchh. unase kaha jaayegaah tum peechhe vaapas jao aur prakaash kee khoj karo.[1] phir bana dee jaayegee unake beech ek deevaar, jisamen ek dvaar hoga. usake bheetar daya hogee tatha usake baahar yaatana hogee
